constraints.name: heap_structure
constraints.description: 序列必须满足小根堆的性质，即每个节点的值不大于其子节点的值

constraints.name: nan_comparison
constraints.description: NaN 与任何浮点数比较时，结果总是 False（除了不等于操作）
constraints.formal: forall x: (NaN >= x) = False, (NaN <= x) = False, (NaN > x) = False, (NaN < x) = False, (NaN = x) = False, (NaN != x) = True

constraints.name: permutation_inclusion
constraints.description: 排列 P 必须是通过某个排列 Q 经过堆化操作得到的结果
